name: [WILL BE DEPRECATED] UnifiedUI (UUI) 2.2
notes: Might not function correctly detecting other mods in EPIC GAMES.

name: BOB the tree and prop replacer
notes: ATTENTION! You need to move the two .crp files into your local asset folder.

name: CSL Map View
notes: Normal procedure. Note: Being unable to export with an 'XML root element missing' error in the log. Train tracks sometimes not included. If you modify a node in NCR or NC2 and output a map the drawing of the corresponding Node part may be incorrect. Passenger helicopter and Trolley-bus routes added in DLC SH are not displayed. (DLC SH is not supported).

name: Demand Controller
notes: Normal procedure. The mod was recompiled because the author was unreachable

name: Extra Landscaping Tools
notes: Normal procedure. The mod was recompiled because the author was unreachable.

name: Precision Engineering
notes: Normal procedure. Warning: Several reports of Null References. Not working together with other actively maintained mods.

name: Harmony 2.x (Mod Dependency)
notes: Folder name must be 'CitiesHarmony' else other mods won't be able to detect it on EPIC.

name: LUT Editor
notes: LUT Creator in-game doesn't work in EPIC. Therefore the executable is bundled.

name: No Big Truck
notes: Requires AVO (Advanced Vehicle Options) to function.

name: Skyve (Stable)
notes: Obtain Skyve and Skyve (Beta) from the official T.D.W's Village Discord.

name: District Styles Plus V2
notes: Note. District Styles are not yet available on skylinx. Please await for updates.
